HotelDescription#This hotel lies just 7 km from Andorra de la Vella and the main street of Encamp. It is 5 minutes from the hotel to the Funicamp as well as to the gondola to Grandvalira Ski Station. There is an abundance of shops, restaurants and bars in the surrounding area.

Renovated in 2006, this hotel has a total of 44 rooms spread over 4 floors. Facilities on offer include a lobby area with a reception desk manned around the clock, a hotel safe, lift access and a bar/ café. There is also a TV lounge, a games room, room service and an à la carte restaurant available.

The en suite rooms are furnished with a direct dial telephone, a TV, a king-size bed and central heating. Rooms with access for wheelchair users may be booked.

Guests can select their breakfast from a buffet. Dinner can be taken as a set menu. It is possible to book bed & breakfast or a half-board stay.

Address: Sant Salvador 3 AD500 Andorra la Vella
Description:
Hotel Aston is located in the centre of Andorra La Vella and within 10 minutes walk of the citys tax-free shopping centres. There is a 24-hour front desk. Free WiFi is offered throughout the property.

Rooms at Hotel Aston have air conditioning and heating. Each room has a TV, telephone, and a private bathroom with a bath.

The hotels café-bar is open from 8am to 11pm (to 1am during the summer) with kitchen so guest can enjoy a nice breakfast, snacking before and after your plans and or a beer facing the sun. To endulge the food we offer Italian cuisine at La Carbonara Restaurant based at 1st floor of the Hotel.


The Hotel Aston is just a 10-minute walk from the Caldea Spa. The hotel is  9 km away from the Grandvalira Ski Resort and a 15-minute drive from the Vallnord Ski Runs. Palau de Gel is located 10 minutes away and the adventure park of Naturlandia is 20 minutes away. Guests are required to show a photo identification and credit card upon check-in. Please note that all Special Requests are subject to availability and additional charges may apply.
Please inform Aston Hotel in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
